title: Number 607 why autofill is cancer
body: You will literally never get an experienced support in ranked. I basically never play adc by the way, I don't think I'm too biased. I understand autofill in norms, cause you're just with your friends and you want to play a fucking fun game of league, but in ranked, It's about winning and nothing else. Would you put some %%%got with a broken leg on a soccer team and just throw away the player? Riot, come on. This is some legit autism I've not seen since the days of tyler getting banned O SHIT I SAID IT KIDDO

replies.body:
Pretty sure tyler is still getting banned about once a week, unless he finally gave up, stopped being pathetic, and got a life.

Upvoted for autofill QQ.
